languages.text: Сколько бы людей ни погибло ради спасения этих богатств, даже за их малую толику можно нанять во сто крат больше.
No matter how many men and women might die to save these riches, one could hire a hundred times more for merely a fraction of this wealth.
languages.original_text: Сколько бы людей ни погибло ради спасения этих богатств, даже за их малую толику можно нанять во сто крат больше.

traits.locale_text: No matter how many men die to save these riches, a hundred times as many can be hired for even a fraction of this wealth.
No matter how many men die to save these riches, a hundred times as many can be hired for even a fraction of this wealth.
No matter how many men and women might die to save these riches, we could hire a hundred times more for merely a fraction of this wealth.
No matter how many men and women might die to save these riches, we could hire a hundred times more for merely a fraction of this wealth.
No matter how many men and women might die to save these riches, one could hire a hundred times more for merely a fraction of this wealth.
No matter how many men and women might die to save these riches, one could hire a hundred times more for merely a fraction of this wealth.

languages.text: No importa cuántos hombres y mujeres mueran para salvar estas riquezas, se pueden comprar cien veces más por una mera fracción de ellas.
languages.original_text: No matter how many men and women might die to save these riches, one could hire a hundred times more for merely a fraction of this wealth.

traits.locale_text: No importa cuántos hombres y mujeres mueran para salvar estas riquezas, se pueden comprar cien veces más por una mera fracción de ellas.

languages.text: この富を守るために何人の男や女が死のうと、この財のほんの一部で、100倍もの人間を雇うことができる。
languages.original_text: No matter how many men and women might die to save these riches, one could hire a hundred times more for merely a fraction of this wealth.

traits.locale_text: この富を守るために何人の男や女が死のうと、この財のほんの一部で、100倍もの人間を雇うことができる。

languages.text: 为了抢救这些财富，哪怕牺牲再多的人都不要紧。只要拿出其中九牛一毛的部分，就可以轻而易举地雇佣到百倍数量的人手。
languages.original_text: No matter how many men and women might die to save these riches, one could hire a hundred times more for merely a fraction of this wealth.

traits.locale_text: 为了抢救这些财富，哪怕牺牲再多的人都不要紧。只要拿出其中九牛一毛的部分，就可以轻而易举地雇佣到百倍数量的人手。

languages.text: Ganz gleich, wie viele Männer und Frauen auch sterben, um diese Reichtümer zu retten, man könnte für einen Bruchteil davon einhundert Mal mehr anheuern.
languages.original_text: No matter how many men and women might die to save these riches, one could hire a hundred times more for merely a fraction of this wealth.

traits.locale_text: Ganz gleich, wie viele Männer und Frauen auch sterben, um diese Reichtümer zu retten, man könnte für einen Bruchteil davon einhundert Mal mehr anheuern.

languages.text: Qu'importe le nombre d'hommes et de femmes qui donneraient leur vie pour sauver ce trésor ; une fraction seulement de ces richesses permettrait d'en engager cent fois plus.
languages.original_text: No matter how many men and women might die to save these riches, one could hire a hundred times more for merely a fraction of this wealth.

traits.locale_text: Qu'importe le nombre d'hommes et de femmes qui donneraient leur vie pour sauver ce trésor ; une fraction seulement de ces richesses permettrait d'en engager cent fois plus.

languages.text: Bu serveti korumak için kaç kişi ölürse ölsün ederinin ufak bir kısmına bile yüz misli adam alınabilir.
languages.original_text: No matter how many men and women might die to save these riches, one could hire a hundred times more for merely a fraction of this wealth.
